description:
A Free, Intuitive 3-in-1 Software for Beginners

Snapmaker Luban is open source, 3-in-1 CAM software developed by Snapmaker. It is optimized for Snapmaker machines, offering intuitive control for 3D printing, laser engraving or cutting, and CNC machining. With a user-friendly Beginner's Guide, detailed settings explanations, and a streamlined workflow, you can quickly learn and use all three functions. Download it now to embark on your DIY and craft journey!
New Features
- Orca Connection
  - Ability to change connection port for Orca Slicer connection to enhance compatibility with different network configurations.
- Laser Engraving
  - Added support for 17 new engraving materials along with corresponding processing parameter configurations, allowing you to save time by simply selecting the matching material preset.
  - Added a material testing feature for laser 3-axis engraving, enabling users to validate the suitability and effects of different materials.
Bug Fixes
- Fixed an issue where the jog height setting was displayed incorrectly after saving. The set height now displays correctly.
